H0.text: Sunlight is the energy source that is nonrenewable.

H1.text: Biomass is the energy source that is nonrenewable.

H2.text: Wind is a nonrenewable energy source.

H3.text: Fossil fuel is the energy source that is nonrenewable.

A4.text: Due to the length of time it takes for them to form, fossil fuels are considered non-renewable resources.
